match_sequence.description: The 'Match & Sequence' title text that is displayed to students

choices.description: The 'Choices' text that shows up at the header of the source and target buckets/boxes

help.description: The 'help' link text that is displayed to students

check_answer.description: The 'Submit Answer' text on the button for students to submit and check their answer

click_ok_to_save.value: 点击“确定”已保存并锁定这一步。你所做的工作将被保存下来，但是你不能再做修改。如果你想继续在这一步工作，请点击“取消”。
click_ok_to_save.description: The text to notify the student to click 'OK' to save and lock the step

step_completed.value: 你已经完成了这一步。请开始下一步。
step_completed.description: The text to notify the student that they've completed the step and that they should move on

correct_feedback.value: 你已经正确摆放了 {1} 个选项中的 {0} 项。
correct_feedback.description: Message showing students how many choices they placed correctly

please_review.description: 'Please review' part of 'Please review Step X before trying again' message asking students to review a step

please_review_step.description: 'Step' part of 'Please review Step X before trying again' message asking students to review a step

please_review_before_trying_again.description: 'before trying again' part of 'Please review Step X before trying again' message asking students to review a step

correct_box_wrong_order.value: 位置正确，但是顺序不对。
correct_box_wrong_order.description: Message to display to student when they got the choice in the right box but in the wrong order

no_feedback.description: Message to display to student when there is no feedback to display

all_completed_msg.value: 祝贺你完成了这个问题！
all_completed_msg.description: Message to display to student when they've completed the step

you_received_x_points.description: Message to display to student how many points they received

this_is_attempt_x.description: Message to display to student which attempt they're on

this_was_attempt_x.description: Message to display to student which attempt they were on

autograded_score.description: Auto graded score that gets displayed in the teacher grading tool.

current_possible_score.description: The text 'Current Possible Score:' that shows the score that the student can receive when they answer correctly
